languages.text:
"Ибо я дышу лишь волей Твоей,
Ибо я живу заветом Твоим,
Я несу твое слово, о Император!
Утешение слугам Твоим,
И погибель врагам Твоим,
Участь страшную, участь праведную!" {n}Закончив, она закрывает глаза и долго, долго молчит, вскинув голову. Медленно, словно первые языки огня в костре, на губах Ардженты расцветает улыбка.{/n}

"For I breathe by the will of Thine,
For I live by the law of Thine,
I carry Thy word, O Emperor!
I bring solace to servants of Thine,
And ruin to foes of Thine,
A fate of terror and righteousness!" {n}Upon finishing, she closes her eyes and remains silent for a long time with her head raised high. Slowly, like the first licks of flame in a campfire, a smile blossoms on her lips.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"Ибо я дышу лишь волей Твоей,
Ибо я живу заветом Твоим,
Я несу твое слово, о Император!
Утешение слугам Твоим,
И погибель врагам Твоим,
Участь страшную, участь праведную!" {n}Закончив, она закрывает глаза и долго, долго молчит, вскинув голову. Медленно, словно первые языки огня в костре, на губах Ардженты расцветает улыбка.{/n}

languages.text:
“因为我依靠你的旨意呼吸，
因为我依靠你的律法生存。
噢，帝皇！我遵从你的话语！
我为你的仆人带来慰藉，
为你的敌人带来毁灭，
带来恐怖与正义的命运！{n}说完，她闭上眼睛，高高地昂起了头，沉默许久。随后，她的嘴角慢慢绽放出了笑容，仿佛篝火中的第一缕明焰。{/n}
languages.original_text:
"For I breathe by the will of Thine,
For I live by the law of Thine,
I carry Thy word, O Emperor!
I bring solace to servants of Thine,
And ruin to foes of Thine,
A fate of terror and righteousness!" {n}Upon finishing, she closes her eyes and remains silent for a long time with her head raised high. Slowly, like the first licks of flame in a campfire, a smile blossoms on her lips.{/n}

噢，帝皇！我遵从你的话语！
我为你的仆人带来慰藉，
为你的敌人带来毁灭，
带来恐怖与正义的命运！{n}说完，她闭上眼睛，高高地昂起了头，沉默许久。随后，她的嘴角慢慢绽放出了笑容，仿佛篝火中的第一缕明焰。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text:
«Pues respiro por tu voluntad,
vivo según tus leyes,
y llevo tu palabra, ¡oh, Emperador!
Traigo consuelo a tus siervos
y llevo la ruina a tus enemigos,
¡un destino de terror y justicia!». {n}Al terminar, cierra los ojos y guarda silencio durante un tiempo, con la cabeza bien alta. Lentamente, como las primeras llamas de una hoguera, una sonrisa asoma en sus labios.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"For I breathe by the will of Thine,
For I live by the law of Thine,
I carry Thy word, O Emperor!
I bring solace to servants of Thine,

A fate of terror and righteousness!" {n}Upon finishing, she closes her eyes and remains silent for a long time with her head raised high. Slowly, like the first licks of flame in a campfire, a smile blossoms on her lips.{/n}

languages.text:
「我は汝の意志によりて呼吸し、
汝の法によりて生きる
私は汝の言葉を伝えよう、ああ、皇帝よ！
汝のしもべに安らぎを、
汝の敵に破滅を、
恐怖と正義の運命を！」{n}言い終わると、彼女は目を閉じ、頭を高く上げたまま長い間黙っている。ゆっくりと、焚き火の最初の炎が舐められるように、彼女の唇に微笑みが咲く。{/n}
languages.original_text:
"For I breathe by the will of Thine,
For I live by the law of Thine,
I carry Thy word, O Emperor!
I bring solace to servants of Thine,
And ruin to foes of Thine,
A fate of terror and righteousness!" {n}Upon finishing, she closes her eyes and remains silent for a long time with her head raised high. Slowly, like the first licks of flame in a campfire, a smile blossoms on her lips.{/n}

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text:
"Denn ich atme, weil Ihr es wollt.
Ich lebe gemäß Eurem Gesetz.
Ich trage Euer Wort hinaus, o Imperator!
Ich bringe Trost zu Euren Dienern
und Verderben zu Euren Gegnern,
ein Schicksal des Schreckens und der Rechtschaffenheit!" {n}Als sie fertig ist, schließt sie die Augen und schweigt eine lange Zeit mit erhobenem Kopf. Langsam, wie die ersten Flammen bei einem Lagerfeuer, entsteht ein Lächeln auf ihren Lippen.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"For I breathe by the will of Thine,
For I live by the law of Thine,
I carry Thy word, O Emperor!
I bring solace to servants of Thine,
And ruin to foes of Thine,
A fate of terror and righteousness!" {n}Upon finishing, she closes her eyes and remains silent for a long time with her head raised high. Slowly, like the first licks of flame in a campfire, a smile blossoms on her lips.{/n}

Ich trage Euer Wort hinaus, o Imperator!
Ich bringe Trost zu Euren Dienern
und Verderben zu Euren Gegnern,
ein Schicksal des Schreckens und der Rechtschaffenheit!" {n}Als sie fertig ist, schließt sie die Augen und schweigt eine lange Zeit mit erhobenem Kopf. Langsam, wie die ersten Flammen bei einem Lagerfeuer, entsteht ein Lächeln auf ihren Lippen.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text:
« Car je respire selon Votre volonté,
Car je vis selon Votre loi
Et transmets Votre parole, ô Empereur !
J'apporte le réconfort à Vos serviteurs
Et la ruine à Vos ennemis
En accomplissant mon destin de terreur et de vertu ! » {n}Une fois sa prière terminée, elle ferme les yeux et garde le silence un long moment, la tête levée vers le ciel. Lentement, comme les flammes naissantes d'un feu de camp, un sourire apparaît sur ses lèvres.{/n}
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
"İradenle nefes alıyor,
Kanunların ışığında yaşıyor,
Emirlerini uyguluyorum, biricik İmparator!
Hizmetkârlarını huzura erdiriyor,
Düşmanlarına korku salıyorum.
Dehşet ve erdemin kaderi budur!" {n}Lafını tamamladıktan sonra kafasını yukarı kaldırıyor, gözlerini yumup uzunca bir süre sessiz kalıyor. Dudaklarında, bir kamp ateşinin ilk korları misali aheste aheste bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"For I breathe by the will of Thine,
For I live by the law of Thine,
I carry Thy word, O Emperor!
I bring solace to servants of Thine,
And ruin to foes of Thine,
A fate of terror and righteousness!" {n}Upon finishing, she closes her eyes and remains silent for a long time with her head raised high. Slowly, like the first licks of flame in a campfire, a smile blossoms on her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"İradenle nefes alıyor,
Kanunların ışığında yaşıyor,
Emirlerini uyguluyorum, biricik İmparator!
Hizmetkârlarını huzura erdiriyor,
Düşmanlarına korku salıyorum.
Bu, dehşet ve erdemin kaderi!" {n}Lafını tamamladıktan sonra gözlerini yumup uzunca bir süre sessiz kalıyor. Bu esnada kafasını yukarı kaldırıp öylece kalıyor. Bir kamp ateşinin ilk korları misali, aheste aheste bir gülümseme beliriyor dudaklarında.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
